subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 29 of the Cavs’ last 30 points in a double overtime victory that put his team one win away from its first trip to the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: LeBron James scored 29 of the Cavs’ last 30 points in a double overtime victory that put his team one win away from its first trip to the N.B.A. finals.
